PackageInfo.name: Composite C1 3.2 Patch 3
PackageInfo.author: Composite A/S
PackageInfo.description: Fixes .net 4.5 related issues, Chrome dialog look, multi lingual site threading issue and MultiKeySelector widgetComposite C1 3.2 Patch 3 fixes issues with saving pages and data and previewing pages. The issues can surface when the .NET Framework 4.5 is installed on the machine hosting Composite C1. Fixes layout issue with modal dialogs in Google Chrome. An issue where one C1 Function accessing non-default data scopes can shwitch scope for functions running in parallel also fixed.
